name: LASER DEFENDER (ShubhamBrody2609)
description:
This is a retro laser defender game which we used to play back in 2000. I am learning unity so I thought to make one of my favourite games. Please download, install and play. :)

Story :  You are Roger, the only Laser Defender left which is assigned to eliminate all enemy space ships . You have been provided a modified alien tech which creates unlimmited laser beams (so don't worry about running out of bullets). If 10 enemies complete their path (go offscreen) instead of dying then its game over and ofcource they shoot you too, so be carefull not to die in a burning spaceship. SUIT UP, Roger!!!
